message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper focuses on automatic readability assessment and text simplification, which are both topics within natural language processing (NLP) and fall under the scope of cs.CL.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The corpus was compiled from web sources, which suggests that the paper may involve information retrieval techniques for data collection and preprocessing.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper mentions the use of machine learning approaches for readability assessment and text simplification, which falls under the scope of cs.LG.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The use of machine learning and NLP techniques for automatic readability assessment and text simplification also falls under the scope of cs.AI.
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper may also touch upon the societal impact of automatic readability assessment and text simplification, as these technologies can have implications for accessibility and inclusivity in digital communication.
